title: 86/268/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 May 1986 amending Decision 75/576/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to restrict the marketing of seed and propagating material of certain varieties of agricultural plant species (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 May 1986
amending Decision 75/576/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to restrict the marketing of seed and propagating material of certain varieties of agricultural plant species
(Only the German text is authentic)
(86/268/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 1 (1) (V) of Decision 75/576/EEC the following varieties are deleted:
'Primura',
'Procura'.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 225, 12. 10. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 253, 30. 9. 1975, p. 36.
